name: AWS SES
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS SES 节点。主要用于: Sends data to AWS SES

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: email

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many templates

fromEmailAddress.name: fromEmailAddress
fromEmailAddress.description: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from
fromEmailAddress.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from | (必填项)

templateName.name: templateName
templateName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Name | 作用: The name of the template | (必填项)

templateContent.name: templateContent
templateContent.description: The content of the custom verification email. The total size of the email must be less than 10 MB. The message body may contain HTML
templateContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Content | 作用: The content of the custom verification email. The total size of the email must be less than 10 MB. The message body may contain HTML

templateSubject.name: templateSubject
templateSubject.description: The subject line of the custom verification email
templateSubject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Subject | 作用: The subject line of the custom verification email | (必填项)

successRedirectionURL.name: successRedirectionURL
successRedirectionURL.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is successfully verified
successRedirectionURL.natural_language_description: 参数名: Success Redirection URL | 作用: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is successfully verified | (必填项)

failureRedirectionURL.name: failureRedirectionURL
failureRedirectionURL.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is not successfully verified
failureRedirectionURL.natural_language_description: 参数名: Failure Redirection URL | 作用: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is not successfully verified | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address to verify | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: textPart (值: None) - The email body that will be visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: textPart (值: None) - The email body that will be visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML
subjectPart (值: None) - The subject line of the email
htmlPart (值: None) - The HTML body of the email

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

isBodyHtml.name: isBodyHtml
isBodyHtml.description: Whether body is HTML or simple text
isBodyHtml.natural_language_description: 参数名: Is Body HTML | 作用: Whether body is HTML or simple text | 默认值: False

body.name: body
body.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: The message to be sent | (必填项)

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: Email address of the sender | (必填项)

toAddresses.name: toAddresses
toAddresses.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Addresses | 作用: Email addresses of the recipients | 默认值: []

templateDataUi.name: templateDataUi
templateDataUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Data | 默认值: {}

subjectPart.name: subjectPart
subjectPart.description: The subject line of the email
subjectPart.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject Part | 作用: The subject line of the email

htmlPart.name: htmlPart
htmlPart.description: The HTML body of the email
htmlPart.natural_language_description: 参数名: Html Part | 作用: The HTML body of the email
